title: Need Logo help
content:
i am trying to get a logo type done saying Third Street I have racked my brain and dont have the know how to do it in these styles or know what font was used, can people on here help me, would be so very greatful. Im thinking street,urban something that will last. THANKS

author: dynamic

comments.content:
What kind of help are you looking for? Do you do graphic design yourself, and if so are looking for suggestions on how best to go about it, or are you looking for someone to do it for you?

JH
i am asking for help doing them. as i dont have the know how or tools needed to do them, might be be able to help me or know someone who can?

As this is not something you’re able to do yourself, you need to approach a graphic designer in you local area. Furthermore, unless you know someone who’s willing to do it as a favour, you going to have to pay them. This pretty much goes for most people on this forum I guess, as this is what a lot of us do for a living.

JH
i am willing to pay for it, i am sorry if it cam across that way.. I have met a few designers here in Melb and most dont know how to do the graffiti style of one, that is the one i am mostly after.

no problem, as long as you let people know what you need. I think logos 1 & 3 should be able to be done by most Graphic designers in the digital realm without too much fuss. Logo 2, I’d say your best course of action would be to get someone to draw your version from scratch, then get it digitized, so that it can be manipulated to any size, without any loss of quality.

JH
